text: Poonthenaruvi Chuvannu is a 1991 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Balu, starring Ravi Varma and Uma Maheswari in the lead roles. http://www.malayalacinema.com/userreview_poonthenaruvi-chuvannu.htm ==Cast== * Uma Maheswari * Ravi Varma * Jayarekha * Thodupuzha Vasanthy ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Poonthenaruvi Chuvannu
